name: Strikes
description:
Want to have fun while training your brain to see patterns?Strikes is fun and addictive logic game where you must plan ahead and spot the possibilities. No time limits or stress - play at your own tempo, and against your own skill at foresight and ability to play strategically. A strike is a series of three pieces where each of three features must be either the same or different on all pieces. Build strikes to keep the board from filling up, and plan combos for extra bonuses.
Go to http://bit.ly/aboutstrikes to learn more about it!
Also available for your iPad, iPhone or iPod touch.
